function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate utilization of technology for mitigating the spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of uncontrolled infection spread and prolonged pandemic duration","Mitigation":"Adopting and implementing effective technology-based solutions for early detection and containment of infections","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, telemedicine, AI for early diagnosis","People":"General public, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Cybersecurity risk due to accelerated digital transformation","Impact":"Data breaches, privacy infringements, and disruption of essential services","Mitigation":"Implementing robust cybersecurity measures, encryption, and regular security audits","Technologies":"Firewalls, VPNs, encryption software","People":"General public, organizations undergoing digital transformation","Owner":"IT departments, cybersecurity experts, technology providers"},{"Description":"Lack of effective management and governance in dealing with contagious diseases","Impact":"Inefficient allocation of resources, mismanagement of healthcare systems, and delayed response to outbreaks","Mitigation":"Establishing strong governance frameworks, clear communication channels, and efficient resource allocation strategies","Technologies":"Healthcare management software, data analytics for resource optimization, communication platforms","People":"Government officials, healthcare administrators, public health authorities","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, public health institutions"}]}
